banner.title: Grandmaster's smith
banner.subtitle: Free community for chess openings and tutorials.
banner.spectateSubtitle: Become the next Grand master, by spectating live games, here at Grandmaster's smith.
counters.endingsDescription: Learn from the chessplay of professionals to checkmate your opponent.
counters.tutorialsDescription: Learn from the best, fight the rest!
rotatingCard.front.title: Master the game, unleash your potential
rotatingCard.front.description:
Your Ultimate Chess Playground

Welcome to the world's premier chess community. Engage with the game like never before on our revolutionary platform. Here's what sets us apart:
rotatingCard.back.title: Unleash Your Chess Mastery
rotatingCard.back.description:
Enhance your chess skills with access to an extensive library of openings, strategies, and tactics.
Connect with chess enthusiasts, learn from grandmasters, and take your game to the next level.
defaultInfoCard.connectedThroughPlayDesc:
Experience the thrill of player vs. player chess on a grand scale.
Challenge friends or make new ones. Forge epic rivalries or mentor newcomers. The choice is yours.
defaultInfoCard.battleTestedAIOpponentsD:
Hone your skills against the world's most formidable chess AI.
Train against adaptive opponents that adjust to your level, offering the ultimate practice experience.
defaultInfoCard.dynamicRatingSystemDescr:
Compete, earn, and rise through the ranks with our robust chess rating system.
Stand out as a grandmaster or rise from a novice to a seasoned player, your rating tells your chess story.
defaultInfoCard.designedByChessLovers: Designed for Chess Lovers, By Chess Lovers
defaultInfoCard.designedByChessLoversDes: Built by avid chess enthusiasts, our platform is your playground. With a commitment to excellence, we ensure you're equipped to succeed, all while being part of a vibrant global chess community. Unleash your potential; become a part of our chess revolution today.
check-text: Oh oh, someone is in check!

fillProfileInfo: Please fill in your profile information.

footerSection.aboutOurSiteDescription: Grandmaster's Forge is a website for chess enthusiasts, created by Group 2 in APP-2000 at USN. Learn more about us.
